actions.text: On agreeing to the Rules amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
Amendment reported by the House Committee on Rules.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Rules amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.

description: Pursuant to the provisions of H.Res. 577, the amendments to the text and preamble specified in section 11 of the resolution are considered adopted.
purpose: Pursuant to the provisions of H.Res. 577, the amendments to the text and preamble specified in section 11 of the resolution are considered adopted.
